I get lost in my music or tinkering with my car.

content.text: What's your favorite way to relax and unwind?
I like to listen to music or tinker with my car.
I love tinkering with cars too! I'm always working on something.
What kind of cars do you like to work on?
I like to work on all kinds of cars, but I'm especially interested in classic cars.
I don't know much about classic cars, but I think they're really cool.
They are! They're so much fun to work on and drive.
I've always wanted to learn how to drive a stick shift.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I have a few stick shift cars that I'm working on right now. You could come over and take one for a spin.
Perfect! I'll send you my address.
